text: (Shikashi) anata gata no meiyaku shita tashinkyō to de, hayaku shita koto naku, mata sonogo, anata gata ni tekitai suru mono o tasukenakatta mono wa betsudearu. (Korera no mono ni taishite wa) kikan ga manryō suru made, kare-ra to no meiyaku o hatashi nasai. Hontōni arrā wa,-nushi o osoreru mono o mede rareru
